# Reading Audio file as source
with sr.AudioFile('/kaggle/input/audio-file/gettysburg10.wav') as source:
# Listening to the audio file and store data in audio_text variable
    audio_text= rec.listen(source)
# recoginize_() method will throw a request error if the API is unreachable, hence using exception handling    
    try:
        text= rec.recognize_google(audio_text)
        print('Converting Audio to Text.. \n')
        time.sleep(10)
        print('Spoken text in audio file is: \n', text)
        
    except:
        print('Try to re-run as API is unavailable')
